content: magic carpet studio 17/2022 a complete tutorial on the grey celtic carpet magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com copyrights notice you may make a carpet using my design and even sell the carpet to make lots of money if you make the carpet it would be great if you e-mailed me its photo and wrote a few things about yourself like your name and where you re from what materials you used the hook size etc you should if you make this carpet and put photos of it on your blog or a website or your facebook page you should always clearly state where the design came from you may not claim this design to be yours copy this design to your website or a blog instead provide a link to my blog or my ravelry account or my facebook fanpage reprint this design in a magazine or a book without asking me first and paying me for it my carpet has about 110 cm 43 inches in diameter and weighs about 3 kilos to make this carpet you will need approximately 1500 meters of cotton string 3 mm thick a 5 mm crochet hook it s size h in the us about 10 hours of your time no matter what string you use remember one important thing the crochet hook needs to be almost twice as thick as the string otherwise the carpet will come out crooked for example if your string is 4 mm thick the crochet hook should be 7 mm thick if you use a string of smaller thickness than mentioned above the diameter will decrease but i can t predict by how much i use the same kind of string they put in sweatshirts to tighten the hood it can be washed in an ordinary washing machine i bought my 3 mm string from a factory in poland https //kordonkinowosolskie pl/sznurek-nowosolski-3mm but i have no idea if they are willing to ship small quantities of string overseas another important thing you should be sitting on the carpet while crocheting it this way the carpet will appear as if it has already been washed and blocked because you have been ironing it with your buttocks the whole time if you crochet the carpet while sitting on the couch it will come out crooked and uneven remember you will never be able to block it after washing because it s just too big magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com i first posted the pattern for this carpet on my blog in september 2022 http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2022/09/szydekowy-dywan-w-warkocze html this carpet is made in the spiral not in the circle so please remember not to close any rounds with a slip_stitch otherwise you will have an ugly seam running through your carpet i made the photos only for the first 10 rounds you will find their bigger originals on my blog i also made videos for cable crossings this pattern
